mapper.select: select * from post_img pi2 order by post_img_no asc

select post_tag_img , post_tag_name ,post_tag_price from post_tag post_tag, post post where post.post_no = post_tag.post_no and post_tag.post_no = #{post_no} and post.post_type = 'Y' order by post_tag_no

select profile.profile_img , member.member_nick , sns_comment.sns_comment_con , sns_comment.sns_comment_date from member member, sns_comment sns_comment, profile profile , post post where profile.member_id = member.member_id and member.member_id = sns_comment.member_id and sns_comment.post_no = post.post_no and sns_comment.post_no = #{post_no} and post.post_type = 'Y' order by sns_comment_seq;

select profile.profile_img , member.member_nick , post.post_content , tag.tag_content, member.member_id from post post, tag tag, member member, profile profile where post.post_no = tag.post_no and profile.member_id = member.member_id and post.member_id = member.member_id and post.post_no = #{post_no} and post.post_type = 'Y';

select post_img.post_img_img from post post, post_img post_img where post.post_no = post_img.post_no
and post_img.post_img_seq = 1 and post_type = 'Y' order by post_date desc;

select post_tag_img , post_tag_name ,post_tag_price from post_tag post_tag, post post where post.post_no = post_tag.post_no

and post.post_type = 'Y'
select post_no from post where post_type = 'Y' order by post_date desc
mapper.sql: select product.product_no, product.product_kind, product.product_price, product.product_name, product.product_info, prdt_img.prdt_img_name from product product, prdt_img prdt_img where product.product_no = prdt_img.product_no and product.product_type = 'Y' and product.product_kind = 'T' and prdt_img.prdt_img_seq = 1
